content: everyday ear warmer designed by angela dykman the perfect ear warmer or pony tail hat or whatever you want to call it to keep your head cozy and keep you looking stylish all the while being able to keep your hair up in a ponytail or bun no increasing or decreasing required a super quick beginner knit what you need us 13/ 9mm 16 inch circular needles us 15/ 10mm 16 inch circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge approx 77g lion brand wool-ease thick and quick or similar super bulky yarn pictured in hudson bay gauge 10 sts snd 12 row = 4 inches/10cm in stockinette stitch on larger needles abbreviations k knit p purl pm place marker cast on 48 stitches with us 13 circular needles join in the round place marker work k1p1 for 5 row switch to us 15 circular needles k for 3 row p for 1 row k for 3 row p for 1 row k for 3 row switch back to us 13 circular needles work rib k1p1 for 4 row last row bind off following k1p1 pattern cut yarn and weave in ends note you have permission to sell the finished product for this pattern but please do not rewrite resell or copy the pattern itself credit must be given to veevee s accessories and linked to veeveesaccessories etsy com share your work with the hashtag #everydayearwarmer instagram @veeveesaccessories facebook com/veeveesaccessories
